content:
Hi @project-const-generics,

starting tomorrow 2021-02-09T10:45:00-05:00 there will be a regular 1 hour long meeting here on zulip.
At the beginning the focus will be on figuring out how to fix the remaining issues with lazy_normalization_consts and how to work towards stabilization.

These meetings will look into quite complex topics, so there will probably be some stuff you do not understand. I still invite all of you to participate and ask questions. Will try answering them either during or after the meeting.
zulip dates are adjusted to your local timezone
assuming your system TZ is local to you
